Oh my god.

   public void dragonclawsSpecial() {
       if (IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002) {
            setAnimation(2068);
            actionTimer = 4;
            SpecDamgNPC(25);
            DDS2Damg = true;
            DDStimer = 1;
            resetAnimation();
            teleportToX = absX;
            teleportToY = absY;
            SpecDamgNPC(25);
            SpecialDelay -= 3;
        } else if (IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002) {
            int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
            int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
            int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];

            SpecDamg(25);
            SpecDamg(25); // Like this.
            SpecDamg(25);
            DDS2Damg = true;
            DDStimer = 1;
            startAnimation(2068);
            actionTimer = 4;
            teleportToX = absX;
            teleportToY = absY;
            SpecialDelay -= 3;
        }
    }

item.title: 317 d claws hit 4 times? problem
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

public void dragonclawsSpecial() {
if (IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002) {
setAnimation(2068);
actionTimer = 4;
SpecDamgNPC(25);
SpecDamgNPC(25);
DDS4Damg = true;
DDStimer = 1;
resetAnimation();
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
SpecDamgNPC(25);
SpecDamgNPC(25);
SpecialDelay -= 3;
} else if (IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002) {
int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];

        SpecDamg(25);
        DDS4Damg = true;
        DDStimer = 1;
        startAnimation(2068);
        actionTimer = 4;
        teleportToX = absX;
        teleportToY = absY;
        SpecialDelay -= 3;
    }
}

should fix…?

item.title: 317 d claws hit 4 times? problem
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

He’s saying this:

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount <= 25) { // dclaws
specialDamage = 0;
specialDamage2 = 0;
specialDamage3 = 0;
specialDamage4 = 0;
sendMessage(“You do not have enough special energy left.”);
}
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount >= 25) { // dclaws
dragonclawsSpecial();
specialAmount -= 25;
}

public void dragonclawsSpecial() {
if (IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002) {
setAnimation(2068);
actionTimer = 4;
SpecDamgNPC(25);
DDS2Damg = true;
DDStimer = 4;
resetAnimation();
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
SpecDamgNPC(25);
SpecialDelay -= 3;
} else if (IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002) {
int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];

        SpecDamg(25);
        DDS2Damg = true;
        DDStimer = 4;
        startAnimation(2068);
        actionTimer = 4;
        teleportToX = absX;
        teleportToY = absY;
        SpecialDelay -= 3;
    }
}

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002
&& specialAmount >= 25) {
ProjectileSpec(252, absY, absX, offsetY,
offsetX, attacknpc, EnemyY,
EnemyX);
ProjectileSpec(252, absY, absX, offsetY,
offsetX, attacknpc, EnemyY,
EnemyX);
calculateSpecial();
dragonclawsSpecial();
AttackingOn2.PoisonPlayer();
usingSpecial = false;
specialDamage = 0;
specialDamage2 = 0;
specialDamage3 = 0;
specialDamage4 = 0;
}

And that should fix it. I’m assuming you’re using Skittlezrule43v.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 d claws hit 4 times? problem
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Apparently calling the specDamg method damages your opponent once, so calling it multiple times should cause it to hit more.

Read full topic

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount <= 25) { // dclaws specialDamage = 0; specialDamage2 = 0; sendMessage("You do not have enough special energy left."); } if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount >= 25) { // dclaws dragonclawsSpecial(); specialAmount -= 25; }

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount >= 25) { ProjectileSpec(252, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, attacknpc, EnemyY, EnemyX); ProjectileSpec(252, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, attacknpc, EnemyY, EnemyX); calculateSpecial(); dragonclawsSpecial(); AttackingOn2.PoisonPlayer(); usingSpecial = false; specialDamage = 0; specialDamage2 = 0; }
